   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_server_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: -export([start/1, crash/1, loop_start_fail/1, call/1, send_request/1,
   30:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   31:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   32:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   33:          cast/1, cast_fast/1, continue/1, info/1, abcast/1,
   34:          multicall/1, multicall_down/1, multicall_remote/1,
   35:          multicall_remote_old1/1, multicall_remote_old2/1,
   36:          multicall_recv_opt_success/1,
   37:          multicall_recv_opt_timeout/1,
   38:          multicall_recv_opt_noconnection/1,
   39: 	 call_remote1/1, call_remote2/1, call_remote3/1, calling_self/1,
   40: 	 call_remote_n1/1, call_remote_n2/1, call_remote_n3/1, spec_init/1,
   41: 	 spec_init_local_registered_parent/1, 
   42: 	 spec_init_global_registered_parent/1,
   43: 	 otp_5854/1, hibernate/1, auto_hibernate/1, otp_7669/1, call_format_status/1,
   44: 	 error_format_status/1, terminate_crash_format/1, crash_in_format_status/1,
   45:          throw_in_format_status/1, format_all_status/1,
   46: 	 get_state/1, replace_state/1, call_with_huge_message_queue/1,
   47: 	 undef_handle_call/1, undef_handle_cast/1, undef_handle_info/1,
   48: 	 undef_init/1, undef_code_change/1, undef_terminate1/1,
   49: 	 undef_terminate2/1, undef_in_terminate/1, undef_in_handle_info/1,
   50: 	 undef_handle_continue/1,
   51: 
   52:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1, format_log_with_process_label/1,
   53:          reply_by_alias_with_payload/1
   54: 	]).
   55: 
   56: -export([stop1/1, stop2/1, stop3/1, stop4/1, stop5/1, stop6/1, stop7/1,
   57: 	 stop8/1, stop9/1, stop10/1]).
   58: 
   59: %% spawn export
   60: -export([spec_init_local/2, spec_init_global/2, spec_init_via/2,
   61: 	 spec_init_default_timeout/2, spec_init_global_default_timeout/2,
   62:          spec_init_anonymous/1,
   63: 	 spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout/1,
   64: 	 spec_init_not_proc_lib/1, cast_fast_messup/0]).
   65: 
   66: %% Internal test specific exports
   67: -export([multicall_srv_ctrlr/2, multicall_suspender/2]).
   68: 
   69: %% The gen_server behaviour
   70: -export([init/1, handle_call/3, handle_cast/2, handle_continue/2,
   71: 	 handle_info/2, code_change/3, terminate/2, format_status/2]).
   72: 
   73: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   74: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   75: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   76: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   77: -endif.
   78: -ifndef(CT_PEER_REL).
   79: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   80: -endif.
   81: 
   82: suite() ->
   83:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   84:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   85: 
   86: all() -> 
   87:     [start, {group,stop}, crash, loop_start_fail, call, send_request,
   88:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   89:      send_request_check_reqid_collection, cast, cast_fast, info, abcast,
   90:      continue,
   91:      {group, multi_call},
   92:      call_remote1, call_remote2, calling_self,
   93:      call_remote3, call_remote_n1, call_remote_n2,
   94:      call_remote_n3, spec_init,
   95:      spec_init_local_registered_parent,
   96:      spec_init_global_registered_parent, otp_5854, hibernate, auto_hibernate,
   97:      otp_7669,
   98:      {group, format_status},
   99:      get_state, replace_state,
  100:      call_with_huge_message_queue, {group, undef_callbacks},
  101:      undef_in_terminate, undef_in_handle_info,
  102:      format_log_1, format_log_2, format_log_with_process_label,
  103:      reply_by_alias_with_payload].
  104: 
  105: groups() -> 
  106:     [{stop, [],
  107:       [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10]},
  108:      {multi_call, [], [{group, multi_call_parallel}, {group, multi_call_sequence}]},
  109:      {multi_call_parallel, [parallel],
  110:       [multicall, multicall_down, multicall_remote, multicall_remote_old1,
  111:        multicall_remote_old2]},
  112:      {multi_call_sequence, [],
  113:       [multicall_recv_opt_success, multicall_recv_opt_timeout,
  114:        multicall_recv_opt_noconnection]},
  115:      {format_status, [],
  116:       [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
  117:        crash_in_format_status, throw_in_format_status, format_all_status]},
  118:      {undef_callbacks, [],
  119:       [undef_handle_call, undef_handle_cast, undef_handle_info, undef_handle_continue,
  120:        undef_init, undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2]}].
  121: 
  122: 
  123: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  124:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  125:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_server.erl"),
  126:     {ok, format_status_server} = compile:file(Server),
  127:     Config.
  128: 
  129: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  130:     ok.
  131: 
  132: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
  133:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  134:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_server.erl"),
  135:     {ok, oc_server} = compile:file(Server),
  136:     Config;
  137: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  138:     Config.
  139: 
  140: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: 
  144: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == call_remote1;
  145: 				     Case == call_remote2;
  146: 				     Case == call_remote3;
  147: 				     Case == call_remote_n1;
  148: 				     Case == call_remote_n2;
  149: 				     Case == call_remote_n3;
  150:                                      Case == send_request ->
  151:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  152:     ok = global:sync(),
  153:     [{node,Node}, {peer, Peer} | Config];
  154: 
  155: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  156:     Config.
  157: 
  158: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  159:     case proplists:get_value(peer, Config) of
  160: 	undefined ->
  161: 	    ok;
  162: 	Peer ->
  163: 	    try peer:stop(Peer)
  164:             catch exit : noproc ->
  165:                     ok
  166:             end
  167:     end,
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: 
  171: %% --------------------------------------
  172: %% Start and stop a gen_server.
  173: %% --------------------------------------
  174: 
  175: start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  177: 
  178:     %% anonymous
  179:     io:format("anonymous~n", []),
  180:     {ok, Pid0} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  181:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
  182:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
  183:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid0,600),
  184:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p, 1)),
  185: 
  186:     %% anonymous with timeout
  187:     io:format("try init timeout~n", []),
  188:     {ok, Pid00} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [],
  189: 				   [{timeout,1000}]),
  190:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, started_p),
  191:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, stop),
  192:     {error, timeout} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, sleep,
  193: 					[{timeout,100}]),
  194: 
  195:     %% anonymous with ignore
  196:     io:format("try init ignore~n", []),
  197:     ignore = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, ignore, []),
  198: 
  199:     %% anonymous with shutdown
  200:     io:format("try init shutdown~n", []),
  201:     {error, foobar} =
  202:         gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, {error, foobar}, []),
  203: 
  204:     %% anonymous with stop
  205:     io:format("try init stop~n", []),
  206:     {error, stopped} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, stop, []),
  207: 
  208:     %% anonymous linked
  209:     {ok, Pid1} =
  210: 	gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  211:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
  212:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
  213:     receive
  214: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
  215: 	    ok
  216:     after 5000 ->
  217: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  218:     end,
  219: 
  220:     %% anonymous monitored
  221:     {ok, {Pid1b, Mon1b}} =
  222: 	gen_server:start_monitor(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  223:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, started_p),
  224:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, stop),
  225:     receive
  226: 	{'DOWN', Mon1b, process, Pid1b, stopped} ->
  227: 	    ok
  228:     after 5000 ->
  229: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  230:     end,
  231: 
  232:     %% local register
  233:     {ok, Pid2} =
  234: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  235: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  236:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  237:     {error, {already_started, Pid2}} =
  238: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  239: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  240:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  241: 
  242:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid2,600),
  243: 
  244:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p, 10)),
  245: 
  246:     %% local register linked
  247:     {ok, Pid3} =
  248: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  249: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  250:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  251:     {error, {already_started, Pid3}} =
  252: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  253: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  254:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  255:     receive
  256: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
  257: 	    ok
  258:     after 5000 ->
  259: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  260:     end,
  261: 
  262:     %% local register monitored
  263:     {ok, {Pid3b, Mon3b}} =
  264: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  265:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  266:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  267:     {error, {already_started, Pid3b}} =
  268: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  269:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  270:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  271:     receive
  272: 	{'DOWN', Mon3b, process, Pid3b, stopped} ->
  273: 	    ok
  274:     after 5000 ->
  275: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  276:     end,
  277: 
  278:     %% global register
  279:     {ok, Pid4} =
  280: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  281: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  282:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  283:     {error, {already_started, Pid4}} =
  284: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  285: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  286:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  287:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid4,600),
  288:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p, 10)),
  289: 
  290:     %% global register linked
  291:     {ok, Pid5} =
  292: 	gen_server:start_link({global, my_test_name},
  293: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  294:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  295:     {error, {already_started, Pid5}} =
  296: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  297: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  298:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  299:     receive
  300: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, stopped} ->
  301: 	    ok
  302:     after 5000 ->
  303: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  304:     end,
  305: 
  306:     %% global register monitored
  307:     {ok, {Pid5b, Mon5b}} =
  308: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  309:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  310:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  311:     {error, {already_started, Pid5b}} =
  312: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  313:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  314:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  315:     receive
  316: 	{'DOWN', Mon5b, process, Pid5b, stopped} ->
  317: 	    ok
  318:     after 5000 ->
  319: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  320:     end,
  321: 
  322:     %% via register
  323:     dummy_via:reset(),
  324:     {ok, Pid6} =
  325: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  326: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  327:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  328:     {error, {already_started, Pid6}} =
  329: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  330: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  331:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  332:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid6,600),
  333:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid6, started_p, 10)),
  334: 
  335:     %% via register linked
  336:     dummy_via:reset(),
  337:     {ok, Pid7} =
  338: 	gen_server:start_link({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  339: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  340:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  341:     {error, {already_started, Pid7}} =
  342: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  343: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  344:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  345:     receive
  346: 	{'EXIT', Pid7, stopped} ->
  347: 	    ok
  348:     after 5000 ->
  349: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  350:     end,
  351:     receive
  352: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,Msg})
  353:     after 1 -> ok
  354:     end,
  355: 
  356:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  360: stop1(_Config) ->
  361:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  362:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  363:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  364:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: %% Anonymous, other reason
  368: stop2(_Config) ->
  369:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  370:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  371:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  375: stop3(_Config) ->
  376:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  377:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout)),
  378:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  379:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  380:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  381:     ok.
  382: 
  383: %% Registered name
  384: stop4(_Config) ->
  385:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  386:     ok = gen_server:stop(to_stop),
  387:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  388:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(to_stop)),
  389:     ok.
  390: 
  391: %% Registered name and local node
  392: stop5(_Config) ->
  393:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  394:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()}),
  395:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  396:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()})),
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: %% Globally registered name
  400: stop6(_Config) ->
  401:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({global, to_stop}, ?MODULE, [], []),
  402:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  403:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  404:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: %% 'via' registered name
  408: stop7(_Config) ->
  409:     dummy_via:reset(),
  410:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, to_stop},
  411: 				 ?MODULE, [], []),
  412:     ok = gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop}),
  413:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  414:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop})),
  415:     ok.
  416: 
  417: %% Anonymous on remote node
  418: stop8(_Config) ->
  419:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  420:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  421:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  422:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[?MODULE,[],[]]),
  423:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  424:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  425:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  426:     peer:stop(Peer),
  427:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  428:     ok.
  429: 
  430: %% Registered name on remote node
  431: stop9(_Config) ->
  432:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  433:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  434:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  435:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{local,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  436:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node}),
  437:     undefined = rpc:call(Node,erlang,whereis,[to_stop]),
  438:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  439:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  440:     peer:stop(Peer),
  441:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  442:     ok.
  443: 
  444: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  445: stop10(_Config) ->
  446:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  447:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  448:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  449:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{global,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  450:     ok = global:sync(),
  451:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  452:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  453:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  454:     peer:stop(Peer),
  455:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  456:     ok.
  457: 
  458: crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  459:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
  460: 
  461:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  462: 
  463:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  464:     {ok,Pid0} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  465:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,reason},_}} =
  466:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid0, shutdown_reason)),
  467:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  468: 
  469:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  470:     {ok,Pid1} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state1}, []),
  471:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,stop_reason},_}} =
  472: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid1, stop_shutdown_reason)),
  473:     receive {'EXIT',Pid1,{shutdown,stop_reason}} -> ok end,
  474: 
  475:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  476:     {ok,Pid2} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  477:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  478:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid2, exit_shutdown)),
  479:     receive {'EXIT',Pid2,shutdown} -> ok end,
  480: 
  481:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  482:     {ok,Pid3} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state3}, []),
  483:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  484: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid3, stop_shutdown)),
  485:     receive {'EXIT',Pid3,shutdown} -> ok end,
  486: 
  487:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  488: 
  489:     %% This crash should generate a crash report and a report
  490:     %% from gen_server.
  491:     {ok,Pid4} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, {state,state4}, []),
  492:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, crash)),
  493:     ClientPid = self(),
  494:     receive
  495: 	{error,_GroupLeader4,{Pid4,
  496: 			      "** Generic server"++_,
  497: 			      [Pid4,crash,{formatted, state4},
  498: 			       {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
  499: 					 |_Stacktrace]},
  500: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
  501: 	    ok;
  502: 	Other4a ->
  503: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4a]),
  504: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  505:     end,
  506:     receive
  507: 	{error_report,_,{Pid4,crash_report,[List4|_]}} ->
  508: 	    {exit,crashed,[{?MODULE, handle_call, 3, _}|_]} = proplists:get_value(error_info, List4),
  509: 	    Pid4 = proplists:get_value(pid, List4);
  510: 	Other4 ->
  511: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4]),
  512: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  513:     end,
  514: 
  515:     receive
  516: 	Any ->
  517: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  518: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  519:     after 500 ->
  520: 	    ok
  521:     end,
  522: 
  523:     ok.
  524: 
  525: 
  526: loop_start_fail(Config) ->
  527:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  528:     loop_start_fail(
  529:       Config,
  530:       [{start, []}, {start, [link]},
  531:        {start_link, []},
  532:        {start_monitor, [link]}, {start_monitor, []}]).
  533: 
  534: loop_start_fail(_Config, []) ->
  535:     ok;
  536: loop_start_fail(Config, [{Start, Opts} | Start_Opts]) ->
  537:     loop_start_fail(
  538:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  539:       {ets, {return, {stop, failed_to_start}}}, Opts,
  540:       fun ({error, failed_to_start}) -> ok end),
  541:     loop_start_fail(
  542:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  543:       {ets, {return, ignore}}, Opts,
  544:       fun (ignore) -> ok end),
  545:     loop_start_fail(
  546:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  547:       {ets, {return, 4711}}, Opts,
  548:       fun ({error, {bad_return_value, 4711}}) -> ok end),
  549:     loop_start_fail(
  550:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  551:       {ets, {crash, error, bailout}}, Opts,
  552:       fun ({error, {bailout, ST}}) when is_list(ST) -> ok end),
  553:     loop_start_fail(
  554:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  555:       {ets, {crash, exit, bailout}}, Opts,
  556:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  557:     loop_start_fail(
  558:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  559:       {ets, {wait, 1000, void}}, [{timeout, 200} | Opts],
  560:       fun ({error, timeout}) -> ok end),
  561:     loop_start_fail(Config, Start_Opts).
  562: 
  563: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun) ->
  564:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, 5).
  565: %%
  566: loop_start_fail(_GenStartFun, _Arg, _Opts, _ValidateFun, 0) ->
  567:     ok;
  568: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N) ->
  569:     ok = ValidateFun(GenStartFun(?MODULE, Arg, Opts)),
  570:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N - 1).
  571: 
  572: 
  573: 
  574: %% --------------------------------------
  575: %% Test gen_server:call and handle_call.
  576: %% Test all different return values from
  577: %% handle_call.
  578: %% --------------------------------------
  579: 
  580: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  581:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  582: 
  583:     {ok, _Pid} =
  584: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  585: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  586: 
  587:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  588:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
  589: 
  590:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  591:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  592:     timer:sleep(500),
  593:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  594:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  595:     timer:sleep(1500),
  596:     false = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  597: 
  598:     %% timeout call.
  599:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}, 30),
  600:     {'EXIT',{timeout,_}} =
  601: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,30}, 1)),
  602: 
  603:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  604:     {'EXIT',{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} =
  605: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, badreturn)),
  606: 
  607:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: %% --------------------------------------
  611: %% Test gen_server:send_request.
  612: %% --------------------------------------
  613: 
  614: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  615:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  616: 
  617:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  618:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  619: 
  620:     Async = fun(Process, Req) ->
  621:                     try
  622:                         Promise = gen_server:send_request(Process, Req),
  623:                         gen_server:wait_response(Promise, infinity)
  624:                     catch _:Reason:ST ->
  625:                             {'did_exit', Reason, ST}
  626:                     end
  627:             end,
  628:     {reply,ok} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  629: 
  630:     {reply,delayed} = Async(Pid, {delayed_answer,1}),
  631: 
  632:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  633:     Promise1 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  634:     Promise2 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, next_call),
  635:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise1, infinity),
  636:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise2, infinity),
  637: 
  638:     Promise3 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  639:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response({foo, bar}, Promise3),
  640:     receive {[alias|Ref],_} = Msg when is_reference(Ref) ->
  641:             {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg, Promise3)
  642:     after 1000 ->
  643:             %% Format changed which is ok. This test is just to make you
  644:             %% aware that you have changed it
  645:             exit(message_format_changed)
  646:     end,
  647:     timer:sleep(1500),
  648: 
  649:     {reply, false} = Async(my_test_name, next_call),
  650: 
  651:     %% timeout
  652:     Promise5 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,50}),
  653:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, 0),
  654:     {reply, delayed} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, infinity),
  655: 
  656:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  657:     {error,{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} = Async(my_test_name, badreturn),
  658: 
  659:     %% Test other error cases
  660:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(Pid, started_p),
  661:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  662:     {error, {noconnection, _}} = Async({my_test_name, foo@node}, started_p),
  663: 
  664:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async({global, non_existing}, started_p),
  665:     catch exit(whereis(dummy_via), foo),
  666:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} =
  667:         (catch gen_server:send_request({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p)),
  668: 
  669:     %% Remote nodes
  670:     Via = dummy_via:reset(),
  671:     Remote = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  672:     {ok, RPid} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{global, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  673:     dummy_via:register_name(remote, RPid),
  674:     {reply, ok} = Async(RPid, started_p),
  675:     {reply, ok} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  676:     {reply, ok} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  677:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({global, remote}, stop_shutdown),
  678:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  679:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  680:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p),
  681: 
  682:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{local, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  683:     {reply, ok} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  684:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, stop_shutdown),
  685:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  686: 
  687:     %% Cleanup
  688:     catch exit(Via, foo2),
  689:     receive {'EXIT', Via, foo2} -> ok end,
  690:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  691:     ok.
  692: 
  693: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  694:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  695:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  696:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  697:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  698:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  699:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  700:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  701:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  702:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  703:     unlink(Pid1),
  704:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  705:     unlink(Pid2),
  706:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  707:     unlink(Pid3),
  708:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  709:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  710:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  711:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  712:     ok.
  713: 
  714: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  715: 
  716:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  717: 
  718:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  719: 
  720:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  721:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  722:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  723: 
  724:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  725:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  726: 
  727:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  728:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  729:     
  730:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  731:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  732: 
  733:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  734:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  735: 
  736:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  737:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  738: 
  739:     no_request = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  740: 
  741:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  742: 
  743:     ok.
  744: 
  745: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  746: 
  747:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  748: 
  749:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  750: 
  751:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  752:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  753: 
  754:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  755: 
  756:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  757:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  758: 
  759:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  760:     
  761:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  762:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  763: 
  764:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  765: 
  766:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  767:     Abandoned = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  768: 
  769:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
  770:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, true),
  771: 
  772:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  773: 
  774:     ok.
  775:     
  776: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  777: 
  778:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  779: 
  780:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  781: 
  782:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  783:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  784:     try
  785:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  786:     catch
  787:         error:badarg -> ok
  788:     end,
  789:  
  790:     unlink(Pid2),
  791:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  792:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  793:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  794:     
  795:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  796:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  797: 
  798:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  799: 
  800:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  801: 
  802:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  803: 
  804:     ok.
  805: 
  806: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  807:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  808:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  809:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  810:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  811:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  812:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  813:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  814:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  815:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  816:     unlink(Pid1),
  817:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  818:     unlink(Pid2),
  819:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  820:     unlink(Pid3),
  821:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  822:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  823:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  824:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  828: 
  829:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  830: 
  831:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  832: 
  833:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  834:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  835:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  836: 
  837:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  838:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  839: 
  840:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  841:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  842:     
  843:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  844:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  845: 
  846:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  847:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  848: 
  849:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  850:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  851: 
  852:     no_request = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  853: 
  854:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  855: 
  856:     ok.
  857: 
  858: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  859: 
  860:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  861: 
  862:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  863: 
  864:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  865:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  866: 
  867:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  868: 
  869:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  870:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  871: 
  872:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  873:     
  874:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  875:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  876: 
  877:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  878: 
  879:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  880:     Unhandled = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  881: 
  882:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
  883:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  884:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  885: 
  886:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  887: 
  888:     ok.
  889:     
  890: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  891: 
  892:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  893: 
  894:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  895: 
  896:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  897:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  898:     try
  899:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  900:     catch
  901:         error:badarg -> ok
  902:     end,
  903:  
  904:     unlink(Pid2),
  905:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  906:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  907:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  908:     
  909:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  910:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  911: 
  912:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  913: 
  914:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  915: 
  916:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  917: 
  918:     ok.
  919: 
  920: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  921:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  922:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  923:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  924:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  925:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  926:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  927:     send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  928:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  929:     unlink(Pid1),
  930:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  931:     unlink(Pid2),
  932:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  933:     unlink(Pid3),
  934:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  935:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  936:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  937:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  938:     ok.
  939: 
  940: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  941: 
  942:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  943: 
  944:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  945: 
  946:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  947: 
  948:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}, req1, ReqIdC0),
  949:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  950: 
  951:     ReqId2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}),
  952:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
  953:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  954: 
  955:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  956:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  957: 
  958:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  959:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  960:     
  961:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  962:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  963: 
  964:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
  965:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  966: 
  967:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
  968:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  969: 
  970:     no_request = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
  971: 
  972:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
  973: 
  974:     ok.
  975:     
  976: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  977: 
  978:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  979: 
  980:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  981: 
  982:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  983: 
  984:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  985:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  986: 
  987:     unlink(Pid2),
  988:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  989: 
  990:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  991:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  992: 
  993:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  994: 
  995:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  996:     
  997:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  998:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  999: 
 1000:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1001: 
 1002:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1003: 
 1004:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1005: 
 1006:     ok.
 1007: 
 1008: next_msg() ->
 1009:     receive M -> M end.
 1010: 
 1011: %% --------------------------------------
 1012: %% Test handle_continue.
 1013: %% --------------------------------------
 1014: 
 1015: continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1016:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, {continue, self()}, []),
 1017:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1018: 
 1019:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_reply, self()}),
 1020:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1021: 
 1022:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1023:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1024: 
 1025:     gen_server:cast(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1026:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1027: 
 1028:     Pid ! {continue_noreply, self()},
 1029:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1030: 
 1031:     Pid ! {continue_continue, self()},
 1032:     [{Pid, before_continue}, {Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1033: 
 1034:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
 1035:     Pid ! continue_stop,
 1036:     verify_down_reason(Ref, Pid, normal).
 1037: 
 1038: read_replies(Pid) ->
 1039:     receive
 1040: 	{Pid, ack} -> read_replies()
 1041:     after
 1042: 	1000 -> ct:fail({continue, ack})
 1043:     end.
 1044: 
 1045: read_replies() ->
 1046:     receive
 1047: 	Msg -> [Msg | read_replies()]
 1048:     after
 1049: 	0 -> []
 1050:     end.
 1051: 
 1052: %% --------------------------------------
 1053: %% Test call to nonexisting processes on remote nodes
 1054: %% --------------------------------------
 1055: 
 1056: call_remote1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1057:     N = hubba,
 1058:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1059:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1060: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1061:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1062:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1063:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({global, N},
 1064: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1065:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1066:     ok.
 1067: 
 1068: call_remote2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1069:     N = hubba,
 1070:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1071: 
 1072:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1073: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1074:     ok = (catch gen_server:call(Pid, started_p, infinity)),
 1075:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1076:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
 1077: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1078:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1079:     ok.
 1080: 
 1081: call_remote3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1082:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1083: 
 1084:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1085: 			 [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1086:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node}, started_p, infinity)),
 1087:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1088:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1089: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1090:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1091:     ok.
 1092: 
 1093: %% --------------------------------------
 1094: %% Test call to nonexisting node
 1095: %% --------------------------------------
 1096: 
 1097: call_remote_n1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1098:     N = hubba,
 1099:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1100:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1101: 			  [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1102:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1103:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} =
 1104: 	(catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1105: 
 1106:     ok.
 1107: 
 1108: call_remote_n2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1109:     N = hubba,
 1110:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1111: 
 1112:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1113: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1114:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1115:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
 1116: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1117: 
 1118:     ok.
 1119: 
 1120: call_remote_n3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1121:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1122: 
 1123:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1124: 			  [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1125:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1126:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1127: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1128: 
 1129:     ok.
 1130: 
 1131: %% --------------------------------------
 1132: %% Other bad calls
 1133: %% --------------------------------------
 1134: 
 1135: calling_self(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1136:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops)),
 1137:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops, infinity)),
 1138:     ok.
 1139: 
 1140: %% --------------------------------------
 1141: %% Test gen_server:cast and handle_cast.
 1142: %% Test all different return values from
 1143: %% handle_cast.
 1144: %% --------------------------------------
 1145: 
 1146: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1147:     {ok, Pid} =
 1148: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1149: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1150: 
 1151:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1152: 
 1153:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1154:     receive
 1155: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1156: 	    ok
 1157:     after 1000 ->
 1158: 	    ct:fail(handle_cast)
 1159:     end,
 1160: 
 1161:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1162:     receive
 1163: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1164: 	    ok
 1165:     after 1000 ->
 1166: 	    ct:fail(delayed_cast)
 1167:     end,
 1168: 
 1169:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1170:     receive
 1171: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1172: 	    ok
 1173:     after 1000 ->
 1174: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1175:     end,
 1176:     ok.
 1177: 
 1178: %% Test that cast really return immediately.
 1179: cast_fast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1180:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1181:     %% After starting a slave, it takes a little while until global knows
 1182:     %% about it, even if nodes() includes it, so we make sure that global
 1183:     %% knows about it before registering something on all nodes.
 1184:     ok = global:sync(),
 1185:     {_,"@"++Host} = lists:splitwith(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
 1186: 				    atom_to_list(Node)),
 1187:     FalseNode = list_to_atom("hopp@"++Host),
 1188:     true = rpc:cast(Node, ?MODULE, cast_fast_messup, []),
 1189:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1190:     [Node] = nodes(),
 1191:     {Time,ok} = timer:tc(fun() ->
 1192: 				 gen_server:cast({hopp,FalseNode}, hopp)
 1193: 			 end),
 1194:     peer:stop(Peer),
 1195:     if Time > 1000000 ->       % Default listen timeout is about 7.0 s
 1196: 	    ct:fail(hanging_cast);
 1197:        true ->
 1198: 	    ok
 1199:     end.
 1200: 
 1201: cast_fast_messup() ->
 1202:     %% Register a false node: hopp@hostname
 1203:     unregister(erl_epmd),
 1204:     {ok, _} = erl_epmd:start_link(),
 1205:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, []),
 1206:     {ok,P} = inet:port(S),
 1207:     {ok,_Creation} = erl_epmd:register_node(hopp, P),
 1208:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1209: 
 1210: %% --------------------------------------
 1211: %% Test handle_info.
 1212: %% --------------------------------------
 1213: 
 1214: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1215:     {ok, Pid} =
 1216: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1217: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1218: 
 1219:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1220: 
 1221:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1222:     receive
 1223: 	{Pid, handled_info} ->
 1224: 	    ok
 1225:     after 1000 ->
 1226: 	    ct:fail(handle_info)
 1227:     end,
 1228: 
 1229:     Pid ! {self(),delayed_info,1},
 1230:     receive
 1231: 	{Pid, delayed_info} ->
 1232: 	    ok
 1233:     after 1000 ->
 1234: 	    ct:fail(delayed_info)
 1235:     end,
 1236: 
 1237:     Pid ! {self(),stop},
 1238:     receive
 1239: 	{Pid, stopped_info} ->
 1240: 	    ok
 1241:     after 1000 ->
 1242: 	    ct:fail(stop_info)
 1243:     end,
 1244:     ok.
 1245: 
 1246: hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1247:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1248:     {ok, Pid0} =
 1249: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate0},
 1250: 			      gen_server_SUITE, hibernate, []),
 1251:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid0),
 1252:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate0, stop),
 1253:     receive 
 1254: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1255:  	    ok
 1256:     after 5000 ->
 1257: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1258:     end,
 1259: 
 1260:     {ok, Pid} =
 1261: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate},
 1262: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1263: 
 1264:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1265:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1266:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1267:     Parent = self(),
 1268:     Fun = fun() ->
 1269: 		  receive go -> ok end,
 1270: 		  receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1271: 		  X = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1272:  		  Pid ! continue,
 1273:  		  Parent ! {result,X}
 1274:  	  end,
 1275:     Pid2 = spawn_link(Fun),
 1276:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, {hibernate_noreply,Pid2}),
 1277: 
 1278:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_later),
 1279:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1280: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1281:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1282:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1283:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1284: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1285: 
 1286:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_now),
 1287:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1288:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1289:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1290: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1291: 
 1292:     Pid ! hibernate_later,
 1293:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1294: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1295:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1296:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1297:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1298: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1299: 
 1300:     Pid ! hibernate_now,
 1301:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1302:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1303:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1304: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1305:     receive
 1306: 	{result,R} ->
 1307: 	    {current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} = R
 1308:     end,
 1309: 
 1310:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1311:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1312:     sys:suspend(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1313:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1314:     sys:resume(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1315:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1316:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1317:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/= erlang:process_info(Pid,current_function)),
 1318: 
 1319:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, stop),
 1320:     receive 
 1321: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1322:  	    ok
 1323:     after 5000 ->
 1324: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1325:     end,
 1326:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1327:     ok.
 1328: 
 1329: auto_hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1330:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1331:     HibernateAfterTimeout = 100,
 1332:     State = {auto_hibernate_state},
 1333:     {ok, Pid} =
 1334:         gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_auto_hibernate},
 1335:             gen_server_SUITE, {state,State}, [{hibernate_after, HibernateAfterTimeout}]),
 1336:     %% After init test
 1337:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1338:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1339:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1340:     %% Get state test
 1341:     State = sys:get_state(my_test_name_auto_hibernate),
 1342:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1343:     %% Call test
 1344:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, started_p),
 1345:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1346:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1347:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1348:     %% Cast test
 1349:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1350:     receive
 1351:         {Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1352:             ok
 1353:     after 1000 ->
 1354:         ct:fail(cast)
 1355:     end,
 1356:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1357:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1358:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1359:     %% Info test
 1360:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1361:     receive
 1362:         {Pid, handled_info} ->
 1363:             ok
 1364:     after 1000 ->
 1365:         ct:fail(info)
 1366:     end,
 1367:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1368:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1369:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1370: 
 1371:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, stop),
 1372:     receive
 1373:         {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1374:             ok
 1375:     after 5000 ->
 1376:         ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1377:     end,
 1378:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1379:     ok.
 1380: 
 1381: is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1382:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1383:     is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1384: 
 1385: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1386:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1387:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1388: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1389:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1390:     case MFA of
 1391: 	{erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1392: 	    ok;
 1393: 	_ ->
 1394: 	    receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1395: 	    is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid)
 1396:     end.
 1397: 
 1398: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1399:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1400:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1401: 
 1402: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1403:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1404:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1405: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1406:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1407:     case MFA of
 1408:         {erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1409:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1410:             is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid);
 1411:         _ ->
 1412:             ok
 1413:     end.
 1414: 
 1415: %% --------------------------------------
 1416: %% Test gen_server:abcast and handle_cast.
 1417: %% Test all different return values from
 1418: %% handle_cast.
 1419: %% --------------------------------------
 1420: 
 1421: abcast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1422:     {ok, Pid} =
 1423: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1424: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1425: 
 1426:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1427: 
 1428:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1429:     receive
 1430: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1431: 	    ok
 1432:     after 1000 ->
 1433: 	    ct:fail(abcast)
 1434:     end,
 1435: 
 1436:     abcast = gen_server:abcast([node()], my_test_name,
 1437: 			       {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1438:     receive
 1439: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1440: 	    ok
 1441:     after 1000 ->
 1442: 	    ct:fail(delayed_abcast)
 1443:     end,
 1444: 
 1445:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1446:     receive
 1447: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1448: 	    ok
 1449:     after 1000 ->
 1450: 	    ct:fail(abcast_stop)
 1451:     end,
 1452:     ok.
 1453: 
 1454: %% --------------------------------------
 1455: %% Test gen_server:multicall and handle_call.
 1456: %% Test all different return values from
 1457: %% handle_call.
 1458: %% --------------------------------------
 1459: 
 1460: multicall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1461:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1462: 
 1463:     {ok, Pid} =
 1464: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
 1465: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1466: 
 1467:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1468:     Nodes = nodes(),
 1469:     Node = node(),
 1470:     {[{Node,delayed}],Nodes} =
 1471: 	gen_server:multi_call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1472: 
 1473:     %% two requests within a specified time.
 1474:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1475: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1476:     timer:sleep(500),
 1477:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1478: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, next_call),
 1479:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1480: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1481:     timer:sleep(1500),
 1482:     {[{Node,false}],[]} =
 1483: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, next_call),
 1484: 
 1485:     %% Stop the server.
 1486:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1487: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, stop),
 1488:     receive
 1489: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok
 1490:     after 1000 ->
 1491: 	    ct:fail(multicall_stop)
 1492:     end,
 1493: 
 1494:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1495: 
 1496:     ok.
 1497: 
 1498: %% OTP-3587
 1499: multicall_down(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1500:     %% We need a named host which is inaccessible.
 1501:     Name = node@test01,
 1502: 
 1503:     %% We use 'global' as a gen_server to call.
 1504:     {Good, Bad} = gen_server:multi_call([Name, node()],
 1505: 					global_name_server,
 1506: 					info,
 1507: 					3000),
 1508:     io:format("good = ~p, bad = ~p~n", [Good, Bad]),
 1509:     [Name] = Bad,
 1510:     ok.
 1511: 
 1512: busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N) ->
 1513:     case erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1514: 	true ->
 1515: 	    receive
 1516: 	    after 100 ->
 1517: 		    ok
 1518: 	    end,
 1519: 	    busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N-1);
 1520: 	_ ->
 1521: 	    ok
 1522:     end.
 1523: 
 1524: multicall_remote(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1525:     PNs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 1526:                             {ok, P, N} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1527:                             {P, N}
 1528:                     end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1529:     multicall_remote_test(PNs, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1530:     ok.
 1531: 
 1532: multicall_remote_old1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1533:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 1, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1534: 
 1535: multicall_remote_old2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1536:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 2, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1537: 
 1538: 
 1539: multicall_remote_old_test(Config, OldN, Name) ->
 1540:     try
 1541:         {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(OldN),
 1542:         PD = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1543:         PNs = lists:map(fun (I) ->
 1544:                                 Dir = atom_to_list(Name)++"-"++integer_to_list(I),
 1545:                                 AbsDir = filename:join([PD, Dir]),
 1546:                                 ok = file:make_dir(AbsDir),
 1547:                                 case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0}, OldRelName, AbsDir) of
 1548:                                     not_available ->
 1549:                                         throw({skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"});
 1550:                                     {ok, P, N} ->
 1551:                                         {P, N}
 1552:                                 end
 1553:                         end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1554:         OldNodes = lists:map(fun ({_, N}) -> N end, PNs),
 1555:         %% Recompile on one old node and load this on all old nodes...
 1556:         SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
 1557:         {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = erpc:call(hd(OldNodes), compile, file, [SrcFile, [binary]]),
 1558:         LoadResult = lists:duplicate(length(OldNodes), {ok, {module, ?MODULE}}),
 1559:         LoadResult = erpc:multicall(OldNodes, code, load_binary, [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]),
 1560:         multicall_remote_test(PNs, Name)
 1561:     catch
 1562:         throw:Res ->
 1563:             Res
 1564:     end.
 1565: 
 1566: multicall_remote_test([{Peer1, Node1},
 1567:                        {Peer2, Node2},
 1568:                        {Peer3, Node3},
 1569:                        {Peer4, Node4}],
 1570:                       Name) ->
 1571:     Tester = self(),
 1572:     ThisNode = node(),
 1573: 
 1574:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, ThisNode],
 1575: 
 1576:     SrvList =
 1577:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1578:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 1579:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 1580:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 1581:                           receive
 1582:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 1583:                                   {Node, Procs}
 1584:                           end
 1585:                   end, Nodes),
 1586:     SrvMap = maps:from_list(SrvList),
 1587: 
 1588:     Res0 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1589:                               {Node,ok}
 1590:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1591: 
 1592:     Res0 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, started_p),
 1593: 
 1594:     true = try
 1595:                _ = gen_server:multi_call([Node1, Node2, Node3, node(), {Node4}],
 1596:                                          Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1597:                false
 1598:            catch
 1599:                _:_ ->
 1600:                    true
 1601:            end,
 1602: 
 1603:     Res1 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1604:                               {Node,delayed}
 1605:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1606: 
 1607:     Res1 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1608: 
 1609:     Res2 = {[], Nodes},
 1610: 
 1611:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1612:     Res2 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1000}, 100),
 1613:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1614:     Time = End-Start,
 1615:     ct:log("Time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
 1616:     true = 200 >= Time,
 1617: 
 1618:     {Ctrl2, Srv2} = maps:get(Node2, SrvMap),
 1619:     unlink(Ctrl2),
 1620:     exit(Ctrl2, kill),
 1621:     wait_until(fun () ->
 1622:                        false == erpc:call(Node2, erlang,
 1623:                                           is_process_alive, [Srv2])
 1624:                end),
 1625: 
 1626:     {Ctrl3, _Srv3} = maps:get(Node3, SrvMap),
 1627:     unlink(Ctrl3),
 1628:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1629: 
 1630:     {Ctrl4, Srv4} = maps:get(Node4, SrvMap),
 1631:     Spndr = spawn_link(Node4, ?MODULE, multicall_suspender, [Tester, Srv4]),
 1632: 
 1633:     Res3 = {[{Node1, delayed}, {ThisNode, delayed}],
 1634:             [Node2, Node3, Node4]},
 1635: 
 1636:     Res3 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}, 1000),
 1637: 
 1638:     Spndr ! {Tester, resume_it},
 1639: 
 1640:     receive Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_msg, Msg})
 1641:     after 1000 -> ok
 1642:     end,
 1643: 
 1644:     unlink(Ctrl4),
 1645: 
 1646:     {Ctrl1, _Srv1} = maps:get(Node1, SrvMap),
 1647: 
 1648:     unlink(Ctrl1),
 1649: 
 1650:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1651:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1652:     peer:stop(Peer4),
 1653: 
 1654:     ok.
 1655: 
 1656: multicall_srv_ctrlr(Tester, Name) ->
 1657:     {ok, Srv} = gen_server:start_link({local, Name},
 1658:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1659:     Tester ! {self(), Srv},
 1660:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1661: 
 1662: multicall_suspender(Tester, Suspendee) ->
 1663:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 1664:     receive
 1665:         {Tester, resume_it} ->
 1666:             erlang:resume_process(Suspendee)
 1667:     end.
 1668: 
 1669: multicall_recv_opt_success(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1670:     multicall_recv_opt_test(success).
 1671: 
 1672: multicall_recv_opt_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1673:     multicall_recv_opt_test(timeout).
 1674: 
 1675: multicall_recv_opt_noconnection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1676:     multicall_recv_opt_test(noconnection).
 1677: 
 1678: multicall_recv_opt_test(Type) ->
 1679:     Tester = self(),
 1680:     Name = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1681:     Loops = 1000,
 1682:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1683:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1684: 
 1685:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1686:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1687: 
 1688:     if Type == noconnection -> peer:stop(Peer2);
 1689:        true -> ok
 1690:     end,
 1691: 
 1692:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2],
 1693: 
 1694:     SrvList =
 1695:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1696:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 1697:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 1698:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 1699:                           receive
 1700:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 1701:                                   {Node, Procs}
 1702:                           end
 1703:                   end,
 1704:                   if Type == noconnection -> [Node1];
 1705:                      true -> Nodes
 1706:                   end),
 1707: 
 1708:     {Req, ExpRes, Tmo} = case Type of
 1709:                              success ->
 1710:                                  {ping,
 1711:                                   {[{Node1, pong}, {Node2, pong}], []},
 1712:                                   infinity};
 1713:                              timeout ->
 1714:                                  {{delayed_answer,100},
 1715:                                   {[], Nodes},
 1716:                                   1};
 1717:                              noconnection ->
 1718:                                  {ping,
 1719:                                   {[{Node1, pong}], [Node2]},
 1720:                                   infinity}
 1721:                          end,
 1722: 
 1723:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops div 10),
 1724: 
 1725:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 1726:     ct:pal("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1727:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1728: 
 1729:     make_msgq(HugeMsgQ),
 1730: 
 1731:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 1732:     ct:pal("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1733:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1734: 
 1735:     lists:foreach(fun ({_Node, {Ctrl, _Srv}}) -> unlink(Ctrl) end, SrvList),
 1736: 
 1737:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1738:     if Type == noconnection -> ok;
 1739:        true -> peer:stop(Peer2)
 1740:     end,
 1741: 
 1742:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1743:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1744:     case Q > 10 of
 1745: 	true ->
 1746: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1747: 	false ->
 1748: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1749:     end.
 1750: 
 1751: time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times) ->
 1752:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1753:     ok = do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times),
 1754:     erlang:monotonic_time() - Start.
 1755: 
 1756: do_time_multicall(_Expect, _Nodes, _Name, _Req, _Tmo, 0) ->
 1757:     ok;
 1758: do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N) ->
 1759:     Expect = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo),
 1760:     do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N-1).
 1761: 
 1762: make_msgq(0) ->
 1763:     ok;
 1764: make_msgq(N) ->
 1765:     self() ! {a, msg},
 1766:     make_msgq(N-1).
 1767: 
 1768: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1769: %% Test gen_server:enter_loop/[3,4,5]. Used when you want to write
 1770: %% your own special init-phase.
 1771: spec_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1772: 
 1773:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1774: 
 1775:     {ok, Pid0} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1776:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
 1777:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
 1778:     receive 
 1779: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1780:  	    ok
 1781:     after 5000 ->
 1782: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1783:     end,
 1784: 
 1785:     {ok, Pid01} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1786:     receive 
 1787:  	{'EXIT', Pid01, process_not_registered} ->
 1788:  	    ok
 1789:     after 5000 ->
 1790: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1791:     end,
 1792: 
 1793:     {ok, Pid1} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1794:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
 1795:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
 1796:     receive 
 1797: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
 1798:  	    ok
 1799:     after 5000 ->
 1800: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1801:     end,
 1802: 
 1803:     {ok, Pid11} =
 1804: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1805: 
 1806:     receive 
 1807: 	{'EXIT', Pid11, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 1808:  	    ok
 1809:     after 5000 ->
 1810: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1811:     end,
 1812: 
 1813:     {ok, Pid2} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous, [[]]),
 1814:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p),
 1815:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, stop),
 1816:     receive 
 1817: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, stopped} ->
 1818:  	    ok
 1819:     after 5000 ->
 1820: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1821:     end,
 1822: 
 1823:     {ok, Pid3} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout, [[]]),
 1824:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, started_p),
 1825:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, stop),
 1826:     receive 
 1827: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
 1828:  	    ok
 1829:     after 5000 ->
 1830: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1831:     end,
 1832: 
 1833:     {ok, Pid4} =
 1834: 	start_link(spec_init_default_timeout, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1835:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p),
 1836:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, stop),
 1837:     receive 
 1838: 	{'EXIT', Pid4, stopped} ->
 1839:  	    ok
 1840:     after 5000 ->
 1841: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1842:     end,
 1843: 
 1844:     %% Before the OTP-10130 fix this failed because a timeout message
 1845:     %% was generated as the spawned process crashed because a {global, Name}
 1846:     %% was matched as a timeout value instead of matching on scope.
 1847:     {ok, _PidHurra} =
 1848: 	start_link(spec_init_global_default_timeout, [{ok, hurra}, []]),
 1849:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1850:     ok = gen_server:call(_PidHurra, started_p),
 1851: 
 1852:     Pid5 =
 1853: 	erlang:spawn_link(?MODULE, spec_init_not_proc_lib, [[]]),
 1854:     receive 
 1855: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, process_was_not_started_by_proc_lib} ->
 1856:  	    ok
 1857:     after 5000 ->
 1858: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1859:     end,
 1860:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 1861:     ok.
 1862: 
 1863: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1864: %% OTP-4820. Test that terminate is run when the parent is a locally
 1865: %% registered process.
 1866: spec_init_local_registered_parent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1867: 
 1868:     register(foobar, self()),
 1869:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1870: 
 1871:     {ok, Pid} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1872: 
 1873:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_server, {self(),stop}),
 1874:     receive
 1875: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1876: 	    ok
 1877:     after 1000 ->
 1878: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1879:     end,
 1880:     unregister(foobar),
 1881:     ok.
 1882: 
 1883: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1884: %% OTP-4820. Test that terminate is run when the parent is a global registered
 1885: %% process.
 1886: spec_init_global_registered_parent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1887: 
 1888:     global:register_name(foobar, self()),
 1889:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1890: 
 1891:     {ok, Pid} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1892: 
 1893:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, started_p),
 1894:     ok = gen_server:cast(Pid, {self(),stop}),
 1895: 
 1896:     receive
 1897: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1898: 	    ok
 1899:     after 1000 ->
 1900: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1901:     end,
 1902:     global:unregister_name(foobar),
 1903:     ok.
